meanings.definition: relating to the breeding and raising of animals for agricultural purposes
meanings.sent1: The zootechnical methods used on the farm helped improve the livestock's health.
meanings.sent2: The zootechnical research focused on enhancing the growth of farm animals.
meanings.sent3: The zootechnical approach to animal care made the cows very happy.
meanings.sent4: Her zootechnical skills were like magic, transforming the farm into a thriving ecosystem.
meanings.sent5: The zootechnical techniques were so effective that the animals seemed to thrive effortlessly.

meanings.definition: a person who specializes in the science of animal husbandry
meanings.sent1: The zootechnical was well-known for their expertise in animal breeding.
meanings.sent2: The zootechnical provided valuable advice on livestock management.
meanings.sent3: The zootechnical had a great sense of humor when discussing animal care.
meanings.sent4: In the world of farming, the zootechnical was a guiding light for many.
meanings.sent5: The zootechnical's passion for animals was evident in every aspect of their work.
